phrs.translation: 句子的, 命题的, 判决的
命题演算, 语句演算, 句子演算
命题联结词, 语句连词
句内转换, 句内语码转换, 指称句内的转换
整句状语, 修饰整句的副词语
句间语码转换, 句间转换

sentences.sentence: This paper questions the validity of the claim that intra-sentential cataphoric reference is unidirectional.
sentences.translation: 本文对“句内后照应单向性”论点的有效性提出质疑。

sentences.sentence: This paper questions the validity of the claim that "intra-sentential cataphoric reference is unidirectional".
sentences.translation: 本文对“句内后照应单向性”这一论点的有效性提出质疑。

sentences.sentence: The sentential meaning is the result of interaction of lexical meaning and grammatical meaning.
sentences.translation: 句子意义则是由词汇意义和语法意义共同作用的结果。
